channel.title: What is router?
channel.description:
[b]see this...[/b]" [u]Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router[/u]. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into "advanced" (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the "gaming" button (is only left side for me...) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:
Name: 1 IP address: 2 TCP Ports to open: 43594 UDP Ports to open: Inbound Filter: Allow All Schedule: Always " _____________________________________________________ i'm trying to create my own server... but i dont know what is [u]ROUTER[/u]... :confused: if some1 can help me...
plzzz :o

item.title: What is router?
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

"Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router."

to get ur router ip go to ur start menu, click run, type “cmd” and press enter, then type ipconfig/all in cmd.

you will see something like this:

btw, standaardgateway means defaultgateway in english

the ip in the box is the ip of your router. put that into ur adress bar in internet explorer/firefox/any other browser and there u can log in

Read full topic

item.title: What is router?
item.dc:creator: @chipmunk_man chipmunk man
item.description:
@chipmunk_man wrote:

[quote=“xp_felipe6, post:1, topic:60608”]see this…"
Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router. You can do this by going into Internet Explorer (or whatever client you use for the Internet), and then type in the IP address of the router. Now log into the router and go into “advanced” (at top of screen on mine). Then on the sidebar to the left click the “gaming” button (is only left side for me…) Then you need to make a new rule and fill in the blanks with this information:

Name: 1
IP address: 2
TCP Ports to open: 43594
UDP Ports to open:
Inbound Filter: Allow All
Schedule: Always "

i’m trying to create my own server…
but i dont know what is ROUTER…
if some1 can help me…

plzzz :o[/quote]
Look at the tutorial?

Read full topic

item.title: What is router?
item.dc:creator: @xp_felipe6 xp_felipe6
item.description:
@xp_felipe6 wrote:

the problem is: i don’t speak english very much…so i didn’t understood the traduction for Router in PORTUGUESE…

and i dont now how to do this:

“Now we will need to make the rule for your router, by doing this you need to go into your router.”

if some1 can help me to do this, thx a lot…

Read full topic

item.title: What is router?

item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

How old are you? Never mind, a router is broadband or dsl connector that allows you to use the internet instead of using old slow dial-up.
